goal.ch: "本課程教導基本電路學及電子學理論(1)，其中包括各種基本電子元件與電子電路分析之方法，是光電、電子及電機工程之重要基礎課程之一，同時為進階積體電路設計之先修課程。培養學生利用簡化等效模型等分析工具，瞭解熟悉各種基本電子元件的工作模式(包含二極體、電晶體、場效電晶體等)，以及相關的基礎應用 。"
goal.en: "This course provides an introduction to the basic devices and circuits in modern electronics. Students will first learn basic electric circuits, semiconductor devices and circuits composing of diodes, BJTs and MOSFETs.  This is one of the fundamental and pre-requested courses in photonics, electronics and electrical engineering.Students will learn how to analyze the electronic circuits with equivalent models.  Some fundamental applications of the components will also be covered."

outline.ch:
1. 基本電路元件簡介
- 電阻，電容，電感
- 電路簡介
2. 基本電路模型
- 穩態/暫態電路分析
- Laplace轉換及電路分析
3. 基本放大器模型
- 運算放大器基本應用
- 頻率響應概念
4. 二極體
- 二極體電路分析
- 二極體操作特性
5. 雙極性接面電晶體
- 接面電晶體特性
- 接面電晶體放大器及邏輯電路應用
- 接面電晶體小訊號模型分析 (放大器及頻率響應)
6. 場效電晶體
- 場效電晶體特性
- 場效電晶體放大器及邏輯電路應用
- 場效電晶體小訊號模型分析 (放大器及頻率響應)
outline.en:
1. IntroductionElectric Components:
- Resistor, capacitance, and inductance
- Circuit analysis
2. Simple Circuit Model
- Steady state / transient analysis
- Laplace transformation
3. Simple Amplifier Model
- OP Amplifiers and circuit model
- Single-time-constant (STC) frequency response
4. Diodes
- Junction diodes characteristics and rectifier circuit
- Physical operation of pn junction
5. Bipolar Junction Transistors (BJTs)
- Device structure and physical operation
- BJT amplifier small-signal operation
6. MOS Field-Effect Transistors (MOSFETs)
- Device structure and physical operation
- BJT amplifier small-signal operation
